thread.title: US man's 60kg tumour probably began as an ingrown hair
thread.title_full: US man's 60kg tumour probably began as an ingrown hair

title: US man's 60kg tumour probably began as an ingrown hair
text:
US man's 60kg tumour probably began as an ingrown hair Last updated 17:09, February 7 2017 
A Mississippi man who was told he was simply fat has had a 59 kg tumour removed during an operation. 
Roger Logan is recovering from surgery at Bakersfield Memorial Hospital for another week or so. 
His surgeon says the tumour probably began as an ingrown hair on his abdomen that became infected. 
It grew so large that when he sat it reached the floor and the tumour forced him spend most of his time in an armchair in a room. 
READ MORE:
